meanings.definition: An excursion outside a spacecraft by an astronaut.
meanings.sent1: During the spacewalk, the astronaut floated in space.
meanings.sent2: The astronaut completed a successful spacewalk yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The spacewalk turned into a thrilling adventure when the astronaut saw a shooting star.
meanings.sent4: The astronaut's spacewalk was like a dance in the vastness of space.
meanings.sent5: The spacewalk allowed the astronaut to experience the beauty of the universe up close.

meanings.sent1: The astronaut will spacewalk to repair the satellite.
meanings.sent2: She spacewalked outside the spacecraft to fix the solar panels.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut decided to spacewalk while humming a tune.
meanings.sent4: He spacewalked gracefully, like a ballet dancer in zero gravity.
meanings.sent5: Spacewalking requires careful planning and precise movements to stay safe in space.
